title: doc: add wiki page on using text/template and html/template
body: I encountered [this comment](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=11374024) and its reply on HN. People feel that Go's template support is lacking; I had the same experience but only for lack of better reference documentation and examples. I would like a page added for Go's template support and listed under "Additional Go Programming Wikis".
